fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.FirstSubmitPPCon.Attach1PPCon"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var docs=[];\\nguideBridge.getFileAttachmentsInfo({\\n success:function(list) {\\n for(var i=0; i<list.length;i++){\\n if(list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\").length>2){\\n var splitString = list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\");\\n var splitStringNeeded = splitString[0].split(\\"/\\"\,5);\\n var splitStringFinal = splitStringNeeded.join('/');\\n var finalString = splitString.join(\\".pdf\,\\"+splitStringFinal+\\"/\\").split(\\"\,\\");\\n var lastEle = finalString.pop();\\n for(var path in finalString){\\n //console.log(path);\\n if(finalString[path].includes(\\"Attach1PPCon\\")||finalString[path].includes(\\"Attach2PPCon\\")||finalString[path].includes(\\"Attach3PPCon\\")){\\n \\tdocs.push(finalString[path].replace(/\\\\n/g\,''));\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n else{\\n if(list[i].path.includes(\\"Attach1PPCon\\")||list[i].path.includes(\\"Attach2PPCon\\")||list[i].path.includes(\\"Attach3PPCon\\")){\\n docs.push(list[i].path);\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n FilePathsPPCon.value = docs;\\n }\\n});"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

disList[i].table1_item2.value.toUpperCase();\\n break;\\n }\\n}\\n//jsonData.RelatedPerson={\\"Caltrans\\":\\"0\\"\,\\"Contractor\\":\\"1\\"};\\nif(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRB\\"){\\n \\tif(DRB_CB.value === \\"0\\"){\\n chairadvisor = DRBMembersDropdownList.value;\\n }\\n \\telse if(Contractor_CB.value === \\"0\\"){\\n chairadvisor = ContractorDropDownList.value;\\n }\\n \\telse if(Caltrans_CB.value === \\"0\\"){\\n chairadvisor = CaltransDropDownList.value;\\n }\\n jsonData.ProjectInfo={\\n \\"ContractNumber\\": ContractNumberDRB.value\,\\n \\"Date\\": DateDRB.value\,\\n \\"DisputeMeetingID\\": jsonData.DisputeID\,\\n \\"REName\\": ResidentEngineerDRB.value\,\\n //\\"REPhoneNo\\": PhoneNumberDRB.value\,\\n \\"ContractorName\\": ContractorDRB.value\,\\n \\"ChairAdvisor\\": chairadvisor\,\\n \\"meetDate\\" : \\"\\"\\n };\\n }\\n else if(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRA\\"){ \\n jsonData.ProjectInfo={\\n \\"ContractNumber\\": ContractNumberDRA.value\,\\n \\"Date\\": DateDRA.value\,\\n \\"DisputeMeetingID\\": DisputeMeetIDHide.value\,\\n \\"REName\\": ResidentEngineerDRA.value\,\\n //\\"REPhoneNo\\": PhoneNumberDRA.value\,\\n \\"ContractorName\\": eachPCR.DollarValue=PCRList[i].tableItem13.value.toString().substring(2);\\n }\\n else{\\n eachPCR.DollarValue=\\"\\";\\n }\\n eachPCR.DelayDays=PCRList[i].tableItem14.value;\\n meetDate=new Date(MeetDatePPCon.value.replace('

'\,''));\\njsonData.ProjectInfo.meetDate=setMon(meetDate.getMonth())+\\"/\\"+meetDate.getDate()+\\"/\\"+meetDate.getFullYear();\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\nxmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\nurl = window.location.protocol+\\"//\\"+window.location.hostname+\\":\\"+window.location.port+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/InsertPositionPaperRecord';\\n//console.log(xmlData);\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url: url\,\\n data: xmlData\,\\n //data: data1\,\\n success: function (data) {\\n //console.log(data); \\n setTimeout(function alertFunc() {\\n \\t/* When submit button operation is completed\, hide the loader/spinner image */\\n \\t$('#guideContainer-rootPanel-guideimage__').hide();\\n \\tthis.enabled=false;\\n PosSucMssgePPCon.visible=true;\\n PosSucMssgePPCon.value=\\"

Please enter BACKGROUND OF THE DISPUTE and/or CONTRACTOR'S POSITION fields

guidefileupload_1939.jcr:title: File Attachment
guidefileupload_1939.name: ReqRecAttachPPCon

fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"content":"var docs=[];\\nguideBridge.getFileAttachmentsInfo({\\n success:function(list) {\\n for(var i=0; i<list.length;i++){\\n if(list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\").length>2){\\n var splitString = list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\");\\n var splitStringNeeded = splitString[0].split(\\"/\\"\,5);\\n var splitStringFinal = splitStringNeeded.join('/');\\n var finalString = splitString.join(\\".pdf\,\\"+splitStringFinal+\\"/\\").split(\\"\,\\");\\n var lastEle = finalString.pop();\\n for(var path in finalString){\\n //console.log(path);\\n if(finalString[path].includes(\\"ReqRecAttachPPCon\\")){\\n \\tdocs.push(finalString[path].replace(/\\\\n/g\,''));\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n else{\\n if(list[i].path.includes(\\"ReqRecAttachPPCon\\")){\\n docs.push(list[i].path);\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n FilePathsPPCon.value = docs;\\n }\\n});"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.RecommendationPanelPPCon.ReqResPanelPPCon.ReqRecAttachPPCon"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
